title: No

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Say no to two players' lives, killing them

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Say no to negative effects targeting you at night, preventing them from taking effect
- Say no to investigations, giving investigative roles info that makes you seem innocent
- The first time you are executed, publicly say no, revealing yourself as No and preventing the execution
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Say no to all who oppose you

desc:
Post 4891
*i say no to adding flavor text to this role*
